item.title: 15 Common Ukulele Chords Chart - Cheat Sheet for Uke Players
item.description: This chord chart for uke players shows the 15 most commonly occurring chords in ukulele play along videos on ukealong.com. The chords are ordered from top left to bottom right, so C is the most frequently occurring chord and Bm is number 15. This ranking i

item.title: Ukulele Chord Diagram Reference Chart for Uke Players Colored
item.description: This chord chart for uke players shows 120 ukulele chord diagrams. There is 1 row for each of the 12 notes in the chromatic scale, 7 natural and 5 flat notes between them. Each row shows the following 10 chord types for the corresponding root note: major,

item.title: 24 Common Ukulele Chords Chart - Colored Uke Chord Reference
item.description: This chord chart for uke players shows the 24 most commonly occurring chords in ukulele play along videos on ukealong.com. The color coded chord diagrams are ordered from top left to bottom right. C is the most frequently occurring chord and Fm is number 2
